name: Clipboard
description: Access the system clipboard for copy and paste operations.

conditions.name: On copy success
conditions.description: Triggered when a copy to the clipboard is successful.

conditions.name: On copy error
conditions.description: Triggered when a copy to the clipboard fails.

conditions.name: On paste text
conditions.description: Triggered on a successful paste of text.

conditions.name: On paste binary
conditions.description: Triggered on a successful paste of binary data.

params.name: Binary data
params.description: Choose a Binary Data object to write the pasted binary data to.

params.name: Type
params.description: The content type (aka MIME type) of the pasted data.

actions.name: Copy text
actions.description: Copy some text to the clipboard. Note this is usually only allowed in a user input trigger.

params.name: Text
params.description: The text to copy to the clipboard.

actions.name: Copy binary
actions.description: Copy some binary data to the clipboard. Note this is usually only allowed in a user input trigger.

params.name: Binary data
params.description: A Binary Data object to copy to the clipboard.

params.name: Type
params.description: The content type (aka MIME type) of the data being copied.

actions.name: Request paste text
actions.description: Request to read text from the clipboard. Note this is usually only allowed in a user input trigger and may show a permission prompt.

actions.name: Request paste binary
actions.description: Request to read binary data from the clipboard. Note this is usually only allowed in a user input trigger and may show a permission prompt.

expressions.name: PastedText
expressions.description: In 'On paste text', the text that was read from the clipboard.
